scripts.performance:test: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.optimize: npm run build:analyze && npm run performance:test
scripts.production:prepare: npm run lint && npm run build:production && npm run performance:test
scripts.bundle:size: npm run build:analyze && echo 'Bundle analysis saved to ./bundle-analyzer-report.html'
scripts.deploy:check: npm run lint && npm run build:production && echo 'Production build ready for deployment'
